# LevelBoundary { #ribasim.LevelBoundary }

`LevelBoundary(self, static)`

Stores water at a given level unaffected by flow, like an infinitely large basin.

## Parameters

| Name     | Type             | Description                           | Default   |
|----------|------------------|---------------------------------------|-----------|
| `static` | pandas.DataFrame | Table with the constant water levels. | required  |
